name: Schibsted ASA
goal: Schibsted is a Nordic media and digital consumer brands group with publishing activities, digital marketplaces and growth companies in Norway, Sweden and Finland. Schibsted is also majority owner of Adevinta. Schibsted's goal is to become a European leader within online classifieds and to develop world class media houses.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Media regulations
Data Protections regulations
Competition regulations
Platform regulation
Artificial Intelligence
Copyright
